title: Tanks! | Complete Project
shortDescription: Tanks! has been completely revamped for Unity 6 to include new worlds, additional features, a playable demo and way more tanks
description: Tanks! has been completely revamped for Unity 6 to include new worlds, additional features, a playable demo and way more tanks. This package is to be used alongside a Unity Learn course (link below).This package contains an extended version of the project created in the Unity Learn course, Tanks: Make a battle game for web and mobile. You can use these assets to create your own version of a single player or local multiplayer tanks game!Want to play our version of Tanks? Give it a play here.You are free to use these assets in any Unity project. This package has a wide array of assets to use and create something unique!Tanks! package includes:13 tank variations3 world themesEnvironmental props for each world theme6 functional power-upsStart, Pause, Tank Selection, and Control UI menu screensTanks and prop VFXMusic and SFXNote: Downloading this asset package using any version of Unity prior to Unity 6000.0.1f1, will download the old version of Tanks!.Asset is under Unity Companion License.
